quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Uncle Ben

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm Wonder Woman, I'm just saying no one has ever seen me and Wonder Woman in a room together.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
quotes.author: Batman

quotes.quote: I can do this all day.
quotes.author: Captain America

quotes.quote: I'm just a kid from Brooklyn.
quotes.author: Captain America

quotes.quote: With a great mustache comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Dr. Strange

quotes.quote: I'm the best at what I do, but what I do best isn't very nice.
quotes.author: Wolverine

quotes.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a hero; it's the choices they make with their lives.
quotes.author: Naruto Uzumaki
